H0.text: What is the heraldic name for the colour green. Viridis

H1.text: What is the heraldic name for the colour green. Emerald

H2.text: What is the heraldic name for the colour green. Olive

H3.text: What is the heraldic name for the colour green. Vert

A4.text: vert () is the tincture equivalent to green
